4302700.name: Helyana
4302700.description:
Humanity is already sentenced to death. You’re just fighting over the ashes.

In this alternate timeline, a fraction of humanity was born with a weak bond to elements. Harmless at first until technology evolved. That bond was amplified. Enhanced and Weaponized.

Some became living forces of nature.

The strong rose. The rest were annihilated, or had a fate worse than that. Now the Earth is a shattered corpse of a world, ruled by a handful of godlike survivors drunk on their own power, locked in endless conflict to decide who stands at the top of nothing.

A divine entity intervened, not to save humanity, but to sentence it. The last survivors are cursed to remain on this ruined Earth forever. No escape. No afterlife. No future. Just an eternal battlefield.

You are one of the remaining strong.

And you refuse this sentence.

While others fight for dominance, you fight for something else: a way out of this nightmare.

“If, on your way you will meet god, even god will be cut.”
4302700.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
